title: Highly Recommended Companies and Business in USA
name: Highly Recommended Companies and Business in USA
description:
A Map by Bharken

Check out America's greatest companies and businesses out there.

properties.name: A2Z Limo in Miami
properties.description: Posted by Bharken 247 South West 8th Street, Suite 308, Miami, FloridaA2Z Limousine is a provider of Miami Florida, Fort Lauderdale Florida, and Palm Beach Florida area Limousine services and transportation. Our high quality services are available in Dade, West Palm Beach and Broward counties. A2Z Limousine is an established and trusted ground transportation service, with client references available upon request. Our fleet consists of limousines, vans, luxury sedans and more. A2Z Limousine Inc. is licensed and insured and established as a corporation. With official permits to provide car service and limousine service throughout the area for local pickups as well as to and from airports. We are also recognized as a transportation option to and from Port of Miami, Port Everglades and the Port of Palm Beach. Give us a call or get an online quote. We assure you that you will get where you are going on time, stress free and in style with our limousine services. SERVICES Airport Transportation Proms and Homecoming Weddings and Receptions Nightlife, clubbing, bar hopping and etc. Business meetings Other transportation services CONTACT US A2Z Limo in Miami 247 South West 8th Street Suite 308 Miami, Florida 33130 Tel: 305-704-3767 info@miamilimo.net

We assure you that you will get where you are going on time, stress free and in style with our limousine services.

properties.name: Boston City Ride Limo
properties.description: Posted by Bharken 276 Washington Street, Boston, Massachusetts 02108If you are looking for a luxury Boston Limo tour or a Boston Airport Transportation, Boston City Ride offers a luxurious selection of limos for any occasion. Your Boston Limousine chauffeurs will understand your requirement of nothing but the finest luxury vehicle service managed and driven by highly professional and personable staff with thorough knowledge of the Boston area. Whether you need airport transportation from Logan, a Boston limousine for your corporate event, luxury wedding transportation, or a night on the town, we have a diverse fleet to accommodate every event with the perfect luxury vehicle to fit your occasion – at competitive rates. Our Boston Limo Services has a variety of cars - from luxurious sedans to super stretch limousines - from Mercedes-Benz to White Lincoln Limousines. Limo buses, motor vans and motor coaches are also included in our fleet. Boston City Ride is always available. Our professional customer services executives are online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to reserve your bookings and update last-minute travel changes. Boston City Ride also takes care of all your needs while you are travelling with our limo service by staying connected to our chauffeurs at your service.

properties.name: Brilliance Preschool & Academy in Dallas, TX
properties.description: Posted by Bharken 3102 Maple Ave. Suite 450, Dallas, Texas, 75201Brilliance Preschool and Academy was established in January of 1996 to fill a need for a high quality preschool education. In a period of six years, Brilliance has added Kindergarten, and 1st – 4th grades. This growth is directly attributed to the positive development that parents have witnessed during their children’s preschool attendance at Brilliance. Brilliance Academy’s approach to education is a blend of the best practices identified by three educators: Jean Piaget, Maria Montessori, and Howard Gardner. In developing its methodology, Brilliance curriculum has taken into account the importance of a child’s early formative years, the cognitive phases of a child’s development, the benefits of learning through concrete experiences, and the evaluation of the eight intelligences as presented by Howard Gardner. Programs 18 Month Pioneers 2-3 Explorers 3\'s Analyzers 4\'s Predictors 5-6 Investigators 1st-2nd Grade 3rd-4th Grade Computer Summer Business Hours Monday to Friday from 7:00 AM to 6:00 PM

properties.name: Chicago Cosmetic Dentist
properties.description: Posted by Bharken 211 S Clark St, Chicago, Illinois 60604Our cutting-edge dental practice is located in the stunning community of Glenview, Illinois, offering leading general dentistry and cosmetic dentistry services. Thanks to our convenient new location, Chicago residents can enjoy professional care by experienced cosmetic dentist William J. Cohen, D.D.S. Chicago Cosmetic Dentist is dedicated to Clinical exemplary service to provide each patient with a lifetime of Dental health and Care. Chicago\'s leading cosmetic dentist, Dr. Cohen, has been helping people achieve gorgeous natural looking smiles for over 25 years. Offering advanced cosmetic and Chicago dental implant dentistry procedures with a high level of professionalism and care, Chicago Cosmetic Dentist helps patients enjoy comfortable dental care with optimal results.

properties.name: G & G Limousine in Dallas, TX
properties.description: Posted by Bharken 2807 Allen Street, Dallas, Texas, 75204Travel around Dallas and Fort Worth, Texas in style and comfort when you hire G&G Limousine Executive Transportation Services for your business, airport or personal transportation needs. G&G has a solid reputation for first-class service and punctuality. After all, we have been servicing the Dallas area and getting guests where they need to be since 2001. Our professional Dallas limo service stresses luxury and safety every step of the way. Because of our stellar customer service we have retained clients such as AT&T and the Daffodil Society! Contact us today for more information or to hire one of our personable Dallas limo drivers. Services Parties Proms Nights on the Town Bachelorette Parties Bachelor parties Corporate Events Airport Transportation DFW & Love Field Weddings Birthdays Corporate Outings Bus charters

properties.name: Mr. Rooter Plumbing in Chicago, IL
properties.description: Posted by Bharken 28 E. Jackson Blvd., Chicago, Illinois 60604Mr. Rooter, a Chicago plumbing company, understands how important it is to service your plumbing and drainage needs in a timely, courteous and professional manner - Whenever you Need us! That\'s why when you call Mr. Rooter Chicago you can be sure that you are reaching a plumbing and drainage professional who has the expertise and experience required to provide you with a comprehensive analysis of your plumbing situation and fix it right the first time. Our mission is to ensure that our ability to properly analyze a situation and treat it with the most up-to-date technology, equipment, and products available in our industry will deliver to you, our client, a level of satisfaction unparalleled in the plumbing service industry-always exceeding your expectations! Mr. Rooter Chicago plumbing service is one of the largest and fastest growing full service plumbing and drain cleaning companies in the world and our plumbers are some of the best in the plumbing industry. With more than 300 global locations, Mr. Rooter Plumbing services the plumbing and drain cleaning needs of thousands of customers each day. Of utmost importance to each plumber on those service calls is the Mr. Rooter mission of providing professional plumbing services with excellent workmanship and attention to detail - with every plumber striving to exceed the expectations of each customer. We accomplish our mission through a unique system whereby locally owned and independently operated Mr. Rooter Plumbing franchises deliver our services using the Mr. Rooter Customer Service Philosophy.
